duties_responsibilities.duty: Generate 3D models from drawings and quotations provided by sales.
Review customer-supplied drawings to ensure information is correct.
Generate detailed plan sets for submittal to customers.
Utilize SolidWorks or AutoCad for design and modeling, with experience in sheet metal and weldment design.
Use Excel, Word, and Windows XP for day-to-day tasks.
Communicate effectively with team members and customers.

education_certification.credential: Associate's degree in Engineering, Design, or related field
